note.p: Scottish forester. Head-forester of Breadalbane forest in Scotland.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Glenorchy 3/3), 1851 (Glenorchy and Inishail 1/4), 1861 (Glenorchy and Inishail 1/2), 1871 (Glenorchy and Inishail 1/2)
